title: Senior Associate - Risk Assurance - IT Governance or IT Cybersecurity
company_description:
At PwC, our purpose is to build trust in society and solve important problems. We’re a network of firms in 152 countries with over 327,000 people who are committed to delivering quality in assurance, advisory and tax services. Find out more and tell us what matters to you by visiting us at www.pwc.com. PwC refers to the PwC network and/or one or more of its member firms, each of which is a separate legal entity.

Content on this page has been prepared for general information only and is not intended to be relied upon as accounting, tax or professional advice. Please reach out to your advisors for specific advice.
about_the_job:
Line of Service
Assurance

Industry/Sector
Not Applicable

Specialism
Assurance

Management Level
Senior Associate

Job Description & Summary
A career in our Cybersecurity practice, within Risk Assurance. Helps business leaders protect and manage their risk related to information regarding technology, people, systems, processes, culture, and physical surroundings. We help clients’ understand their current capability and develop a plan to build cyber security resilience to identify, protect, detect and respond to cybersecurity threats, including advising on various regulatory and data privacy issues.

IT Cybersecurity

Responsibilities:
Perform assessment / design/ implementation related to cybersecurity:
Governance using various standards / frameworks such as NIST, ISO 27000 family, PCI-DSS, COBIT, CIS, and other established standards; or
Various application security and various infrastructure security (e.g operating system, database, firewall, switches, API and other security devices). This includes security assessment on web applications / infrastructures / clouds / mobile applications; or
Cloud security; or
Red teaming exercise; or
Cyber incident response, threat hunting and incident analysis; or
Operation technology security (preferably in energy, mining, utilities or oil & gas industry). 
Provide recommendations / advice to clients.
Train, coach and upskill team members’ capabilities.
Perform active business developments, marketing, proposal preparation process, and lead pursuit of IT-related security projects.
Interacting with clients on solutions and executing projects on client engagements, forming client relationships and demonstrating an understanding of the client’s business.
Preparing concise and accurate documents / report, leveraging and utilizing MS Office (Word, Excel, Access, PowerPoint).

 

Requirements:
Minimum - a bachelor’s degree within a related field.
Three to five years of work experience in a relevant area. Having experience in a cybersecurity consulting firm is an advantage.
Good professional reporting skills in Bahasa Indonesia and English. 
Good knowledge of relevant cybersecurity standards / frameworks.
Good experience and knowledge in general IT technical and controls, network, and security best practises.
Having a related cybersecurity certificate is an advantage e.g.:
Cybersecurity Governance area: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) or Certified Information Security Manager (CISM).
Application and Infrastructure security area: Offensive Security Certified Professional (OSCP) or Offensive Security Certified Expert (OSCE).
Cloud security: Certified Cloud Security Professional (CCSP) or advanced security certification from Cloud Service Provider


IT GovernanceRequirements
Minimum - a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Management Information Systems, Accounting, or related field.
Three to five years of work experience in a relevant area. Having experience in conducting IT review / assessment and/ or IT regulatory compliance.
Familiar with COBIT framework and IT regulations in Indonesia.
Familiar with technology that supports financial and operational application systems and related business processes.
Ability to identify IT related risks and sufficient controls in business processes.
Strong time management skills, including flexibility to work with shifting priorities and client needs.
Ability to perform coaching and developing junior team members.
Strong communication skills to build client relationships (networking).
Strong presentation and report writing skills (in English and Bahasa).
Fast learning to understand new business and clients.
 Desirable skills:
Control Objectives for Information and Related Technologies (COBIT)/ Certified in Governance of Enterprise IT (CGEIT)/ Certified in Risk and Information Systems Control (CRISC)/ Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA) qualification, or equivalent is an advantage.
Experience in performing IT review of one of these: financial services / telecommunications / manufacturing / consumer and retail / energy, utilities, and resources / startup companies.
Experience in IT Sarbanes-Oxley review and / or IT Governance review is an advantage.
 

Education (if blank, degree and/or field of study not specified)
Degrees/Field of Study required:

Degrees/Field of Study preferred: Bachelor Degree - Accounting

Certifications (if blank, certifications not specified)

Required Skills

Optional Skills

Desired Languages (If blank, desired languages not specified)

Travel Requirements
Up to 40%

Available for Work Visa Sponsorship?
No

Government Clearance Required?
No

Job Posting End Date

title: Remedial Circle Lead
company_description:
Amar Bank is transforming banking for the digital era since 2014. We're all about supporting small businesses and those who don't have access to conventional banks. Our AI and cloud technology hooks you up with personalized ways to save, pay, and handle your finances.

Meet our star player: Tunaiku! As of 2023, Tunaiku has served more than 14 million loan applicants, enabling those who are in need to access over IDR 9 trillion loans.

At Amar Bank, we aim to make a meaningful impact on the lives of our customers. Get ready to level up with our epic innovations!

PT Bank Amar Indonesia Tbk is a participant in LPS guarantee, licensed and supervised by OJK.
about_the_job:
Who are we?

Amar Bank is one of the most technologically advanced digital banks in Indonesia. Our leading digital lending product, Tunaiku has the distinction of being the first FinTech product in Indonesia. We are also the first digital bank on the cloud. As the first profitable digital bank, we managed to get listed on the Indonesian Stock Exchange.

How did we manage to do that?

We are changing people’s perception of a bank. We believe we are the innovators who combine customer focus principles with creating technology-based impact. We incorporate freedom and flexibility as part of our startup working culture DNA to encourage innovation in creating better financial solutions for the banking industry. We think of ourselves as, ‘A technology company with a banking license’. For this reason, we ‘Act like a FinTech, and think like a Bank.’

How did it all start?

Founded on March 15, 1991, in Surabaya as PT Anglomas International Bank (Amin Bank), the bank was acquired by Tolaram Group and transformed to PT Bank Amar Indonesia (Amar Bank) in 2014. It has then undergone a significant digital transformation to become one of the country's forerunning fintech institutions through its award-winning digital lending platform, Tunaiku.

Our philosophy, mission, and vision

Technology must impact lives, must improve lives. We exist to provide banking to those who ‘need’ and not only to those who ‘want’. Services when provided to those who need at the time of their need brings smiles. Our vision is to bring 200 million smiles.

More about the bank with startup culture environment

Consist of 1000+ people, you will meet people who love to grow, dream big, and actually have fun at the workplace! We provide a great working environment that pushes people to grow outside their comfort zone. People with high drive and ambition find us a very attractive place to work as their career growth matches their own drive and not any staid policies. Thus we hold the honor of being awarded “Best Place to Work in Indonesia”.Recently Amar Bank was awarded as Inspirational Brand from APEA (Asia Pacific Enterprise Awards) 2022. Of course, our innovation won't stop here. So if you would love to be a part of it, have a growth mindset, and are constantly hungry for challenges, we invite you to join us in our journey to ‘Impact Lives’.

Join us today and create #unlimitedinnovations!

Remedial Circle Lead position is going to lead the remedial team to achieve sales targets for AYDA, Auctions, and handle and give solution for Bad Debt Customer. This position will report to the SME, Corporate and Operational Director.

Responsibilities

Meet certain sales targets for Semester 1 (until June 2023) related to Auction, AYDA, and Bad debt (NPL)
Sell the AYDA Asset, Collateral Asset in through auction or others channel, and handle the bad debt customer to solve the problem to reduce the NPL
Lead and maximize remedial team to achieve remedial team target
Cooperate with business team to handle the watchlist customer

Requirements

Experienced in AYDA (agunan yang diambil alih)* acquisition, asset sales through or without action, litigation in court
Experienced in banking especially handling fixed asset
Possess high qualities of open mindednesses, networking skills, comprehensive negotiation skills, and self motivation
Strong willed and strive for high achievements

title: IT Infrastructure Support (IT Pro)
company_description:
PT. Qtasnim Digital Teknologi (Qtasnim) berdiri secara legal sejak Mei 2013. Qtasnim merupakan perusahaan yang berkomitmen bergerak di bidang solusi dan pelayanan bidang teknologi informasi. Tim kami merupakan para profesional yang telah memiliki dedikasi dan pengalaman di bidang Teknologi Informasi.

Kami berpengalaman dalam memberikan solusi terbaik dalam membangun dan mengembangkan aplikasi enterprise, integrasi sistem , pengembangan webportal dan aplikasi mobile. Soliditas dan integritas tim telah mampu membangun perusahaan yang unggul dan dapat dipertanggungjawabkan untuk memberikan layanan terbaik bagi klien dan seluruh stakeholder terkait dalam bisnis dan pengembangannya. Oleh karenanya, kualitas telah menjadi komitmen kami.
about_the_job:

Pengalaman dibagian IT Infrastructure minimal 1 tahun
Pengalaman dalam handle Mikrotik, Topology Jaringan, Networking, VIrtualiasi, dan server
Bersedia visit apabila dibutuhkan
Berpengalaman menangani Setup Server dan OS (Windows, Linux, Mac)
Pengalaman menangani troubleshooting dan instalasi Jaringan dan Internet
Pengalaman menangani troubleshoot PC / Laptop
Melakukan site reliability testing
Berpengalaman menangani instalasi sistem pendukung (Database, Server Aplikasi, Web Server, Firewall, dll)
Berpengalaman membuat laporan kegiatan instalasi
Berdomisili di Bandung lebih diutamakan

title: Sales Executive (Media Industry)
company_description:
Female Daily (Part of Transmedia Group) is Indonesia's largest beauty destination on a mission to revolutionise the way Indonesian women discover, share and buy beauty products, services & cosmetics. It's home to the largest female online community and beauty enthusiast where content, community meets commerce.


Share and discover the most comprehensive beauty products reviews, salons & spa reviews, beauty trends, and original editorial content at Femaledaily.com
about_the_job:
What You’ll Do

Identifying clients’ needs
Creating winning proposals and presenting them to prospective clients

title: Fiel Service Engineer Staff - Sidoarjo
company_description:
PT. Medquest Jaya Global since its establishment in 2004 concentrating in distributing medical device and pharmaceutical, by promoting innovation and latest technology. We currently distribute more than 20 leading brands in the world, which includes the equipment in the field of blood bank, cardiology, diagnostics, research and industry.

We currently divide our business into 5 divisions : blood bank, Hospital & Clinical Diagnostic, life sciences, pharmaceutical and vaccine, also overseas business. With a coverage area includes government hospitals, private hospitals, research laboratories, clinics, department of health and blood transfusion units throughout Indonesia and other country for overseas division coverage. All sales are done directly, or through tenders both domestic and international. Our field sales representatives are knowledgeable and highly trained in all of our markets and product lines.

We currently have 136 of professional employees from Marketing, Administrations, Sales, and Engineers determined to deliver better solutions to our customers that are all unique and important. We believe commitment, integrity, strong teamwork and customer satisfactions are keys to achieve our vision and mission.
about_the_job:
Company Description: PT. Medquest Jaya Global sejak berdiri pada tahun 2004 berkonsentrasi dalam distribusi alat kesehatan dan farmasi, dengan mengedepankan inovasi dan teknologi terkini. Saat ini kami mendistribusikan lebih dari 20 merk ternama di dunia yang meliputi peralatan di bidang bank darah, kardiologi, diagnostik, penelitian dan industri. Saat ini kami membagi bisnis kami menjadi 5 divisi: bank darah, Rumah Sakit & Diagnostik Klinis, ilmu hayat, farmasi dan vaksin, serta bisnis di luar negeri. Job Description:

 Install, maintain, and perform preventive maintenance on medical devices
 Ensure proper functioning of devices/equipment and spare parts
 Ensure devices operate according to standards

Collaborate with the internal stakeholders (such as Tech, Marketing, Operations) to ensure successful launch of new partnerships

Qualifications

Result-driven individual with execution mindset and passion for networking

title: Sales Specialist (Chili)
company_description:
Jiva is on a mission to improve the livelihoods of 500 million smallholder farmers across the world through thoughtful digitisation. Through our mobile applications and partner network, we work directly with farmers to deliver four critical services: micro-financing, agri-ecommerce, harvest purchase, and personalised agronomy advisory.

Since our launch in Indonesia and India in 2020, we have added billions back into local economies, provided advisory to over 10 million farmers, and purchased over 500K tonnes of harvest. We are a passionate, purpose-driven team looking for talented people to help us drive our next phase of growth.

Jiva is backed by Olam International, one of the world’s largest agri-commodity and food companies with unparalleled presence in rural communities and relationships with millions of smallholder farmers.

Jiva is headquartered in Singapore, with offices in Indonesia and India.

Want to learn more? Visit us at www.jiva.ag

Looking to work at Jiva? Careers@jiva.ag

Partnership and general enquiries? hello@jiva.ag
about_the_job:
General Overview

The Sales Specialist (Chili) will identify business opportunities and manage partnerships with chili offtakers - GT, wholesalers, horeca, and chili processing company, negotiate the selling price and monitor the price.

This role will report directly to the Area Sales Executive

Roles And Responsibilities

Identifying business opportunities and extending partnerships to offtakes buyers
Contacts and develop a business relationship in the region
Deepening existing relationships and assisting transactions with buyers
Analyse offtakes sales and operations to increase sales and offtakes process efficiency
Updating prices and stock information on daily basis (at desired frequency)
Capturing market practices (Operating hours, quality requirements, variety requirements, refraction practices)
Quality tracking at wholesalers - Aligning with the QC Team


Pre-harvest season

Identifying business opportunities by identifying prospective buyers (Chili wholesalers, horeca, chili processing company)
Support the operation in establishing contacts and developing relationships at the region level
Manage key accounts and groom top buyers to key account status
Gather crops buying prices from buyers (Chili wholesalers) in the region
Buyer onboarding to the JIVA system


Harvest season

Assign harvest to buyers with logistic executive
Monitor buyer performance
Ensure that buyers are paying based on the contract term


Requirements

Fluent in English and Bahasa Language
Proven work experience in the sales of Fresh commodities (Chili) for at least 4 years
Have a leverage networking with Chili buyers all around Indonesia territory
Strong negotiation skills
Result-oriented and target-driven
Excellent written and oral communication skills.
Strong Microsoft office skills, especially MS. Excel

title: Project Manager - Data Center
company_description:
Welcome to the Michael Page global company profile.

Michael Page has five decades of expertise in professional services recruitment. We were established in London in 1976, and over this period we've grown organically to become one of the best-known and most respected consultancies, with an office network spanning six continents.

While size has its advantages, it doesn't define us - the nature of our organic growth means that each new office is integrated into the region that it serves. It also means that as an employer looking to hire, or as a candidate aiming to grow your career you have the best of both worlds; a team that understands the market and geography you operate in, plus the resources and expertise of an international network at your disposal.

Our teams are broken down to focus on industry, assignment type, salary level and location, so your hiring requirements or job search will all be handled by a specialist who knows your sector inside-out. We are confident that our expertise can add value to your recruitment or job search process – get in touch to find out more.
about_the_job:
Multinational company|Fast paced working environment


About Our Client

We are currently working with one of the leading technology company who is looking for a competent Data Cenetr Project Manager to help them in this time of growth.

Job Description

Lead and oversee the end-to-end management of data center projects from initiation to completion, ensuring strict adherence to timelines, budgets, and quality standards.
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, construction, procurement, and other stakeholders, to ensure seamless project execution.
Develop and maintain project plans, schedules, and budgets, regularly monitoring and reporting on project progress to stakeholders.
Utilize your strong background in electrical engineering to provide technical expertise and guidance throughout the project lifecycle.
Manage project risks, issues, and change requests effectively, implementing mitigation strategies as necessary to ensure project success.
Serve as the main point of contact for project-related communications, fostering clear and effective communication channels among all stakeholders.
Work closely with the expat Project Director, providing regular updates and ensuring alignment with project objectives and strategies.


The Successful Applicant

Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field.
Proven experience (8 years) as a Project Manager, specifically in data center projects.
Strong understanding of data center infrastructure, including power distribution, cooling systems, and networking.
Exceptional project management skills, including the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Proficiency in English (verbal and written) is essential, as this role involves reporting to an expat Project Director.
Excellent communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with diverse teams and stakeholders.
Demonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced environment, delivering results within tight deadlines.
PMP, CDCP and other relevant certification is a plus.

What's on Offer

Great career prospects as the growth opportunity in the company is tremendous.
The chance to really impact the decisions of a very successful business and input into process, procedures & systems


Contact: Veny Adilia

Quote job ref: JN-012024-6288680

title: IT - Cabang Karawang
company_description:
PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk (BFI) was established in 1982 as PT Manufacturers Hanover Leasing Indonesia, a joint venture between Manufacturers Hanover Leasing Corporation from the United States and local partners. It is one of the oldest multifinance companies in Indonesia as well as the first multifinance company to be listed on the Jakarta Stock Exchange and Surabaya Stock Exchange (currently known as Indonesia Stock Exchange or IDX). BFI Finance was listed in May 1990 with ticker code BFIN. After undertaking debt restructuring due to the Asian financial crisis started in 1998, BFI Finance officially changed its name to PT BFI Finance Indonesia Tbk in 2001.

BFI is currently has more than 200 outlets throughout Indonesia. Supported by more than 7,000 employees, BFI is able to acquire and process applications from the public quickly, and collect receivables to customers with an efficient work system. The company's performance was very good from year to year makes BFI is able to achieve a variety of significant achievements and awards.
about_the_job:

title: Business Development (Mekari Talenta)
company_description:
Mekari is the #1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company in Indonesia, aiming to empower the progress of businesses and professionals across various industries.

Our innovative cloud-based technology solution in HR (Mekari Talenta), Accounting (Mekari Jurnal), Sales (Mekari Qontak), Tax (Mekari Klikpajak), Electronic Signature (Mekari Sign), and Benefits (Mekari Flex) have been used by tens thousands of businesses in Indonesia.

To reach millions, we need more people like you —those eager to innovate, lead, and win with us.
about_the_job:
Mekari is Indonesia's no. 1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company. Our mission is to empower businesses and professionals to progress effortlessly. Our products (Mekari Talenta, Mekari Jurnal, Mekari KlikPajak, & Mekari Qontak) have been used by tens of thousands of businesses in Indonesia.

To reach millions, we need more people like you: entrepreneurs, builders, owners inside the company who are eager to grow at scale. Join us to empower more businesses with technology.

Job Descriptions

Research companies to contact in.
Start Relationship with potential Manager or CEO.
Craft emails to those contacts to convey the value of our HRIS and book an introductory meeting with them.
Make cold and warm phone calls to contacts to follow up or preempt your email communications, manage the entire sales cycle, from prospecting to call, giving demos & closing.
Experiment with different outreach intervals and content to identify successful strategies.
Collaborate with engineering and customer success team to deliver product feedback and feature requests.
Analyze and target new opportunities for Accounting or HR Software to grow our footprint.
Work directly with marketing to discover opportunities from leads, and set appointments from those leads.
Use of strong selling and influencing skills to set up qualified appointments.
Log, track, and maintain customer contact and contact records.
Participate in community networking activities to promote Accounting or HR Software.

Requirements/Qualifications

Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Comfortable and confident speaking to mid-level and senior executives.
Strong organizational skills Strong interpersonal communication skills.
Analytical, detail-oriented and results-focused Scrappy and competitive!.
Desire to drive results and improve every single day.
Prior experience selling or marketing is a plus but is not required.
We’re seeking an exceptional individual to help drive the growth of our sales efforts in the rapidly changing local delivery industry.
If Possible Have 1-2 years of experience cold calling and selling SaaS or IT products (SMEs / SMBs), preferably from Bachelor Degree in Accountancy, Management, or equivalent, but Fresh Graduate is also welcomed.
If possible track record of over-achieving quota.
Proficient with corporate productivity and with web presentation tools.
Have a positive, can-do attitude, extraordinary hustle, disdain for failure, and hunger/appreciation for feedback.
Have extraordinary oral & written communication skills.
Have deep self-motivation and the ability to self-manage.
Huge plus: experience selling to HR Manager, CEO, Accountant or Finance Manager Comfortable working in a small, distributed team.

What You Will Get

 Competitive salary + daily allowance.
 Premium private health insurance (outpatient, inpatient, maternity, dental).
 Early access to salary + flex installment (employee loan) via Mekari Flex.
 Allowance for sports activities and glasses/contact lenses.
 Flexible working hours and remote work culture with free co-working space services.
 Annual and unpaid leaves from day 1 of join date + unlimited sick leave with doctor note.
 Notebook Ownership Program.
 Strategic office location, accessible by MRT.
 Friendly and dynamic work environment.
 Opportunity to take part in growing Indonesia's no. 1 SaaS company

Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application is shortlisted to the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up.

Don't forget to check our Recruitment FAQ at bit.ly/RecruitmentFAQ-Mekari [ENG] or bit.ly/RekrutmenMekari-FAQ [INA] to find the answers to commonly-asked questions regarding our recruitment process.

We wish you the best. Hope to see you around soon!

title: Senior Sales Engineer ( Remote)
company_description:
Talent Hunts is an Executive Search Agency that is built by the idealism of its Founder to provide excellent recruitment services to our clients. Started by a Professional Executive Search with more than a decade of experience working in a Multinational Executive Search agency and combine with years of experience on the corporate side, providing multiple perspectives to our clients which will result in a better experience in recruitment.

We know it is never been an easy job to find the best talents in the market, but our team's years of experience as well as our approach will surely make the search of talents, will be more efficient and effective. Talent Hunts is one of few Executive search agencies that believe that a combination of people, process, and technology will bring a new experience in recruitment.

With its Value of Honesty, Excellent, and Respect we strive not only to be one of the best recruitment agencies in Indonesia but also to build our reputation in the recruitment industry.
about_the_job:
To grow sales revenue through the establishment of distribution networks within the defined market sectors:

Oil & Gas
Marine
Mining


Primary Responsibilities include the following, other duties may be assigned:

Handle sales of company range of industrial products.
Identify from company Group portfolio of products and brands, the target product ranges that
fits to the market needs.
Attend to sales enquiries, prepare sales quotation/proposal to closing of sales, conduct cold calls,
follow-up on customer order and delivery.
Increase market share and customer base by developing distribution partners and customers.
Responsible for customer and account management (e.g. receivable collection).
Prepare sales presentations to create product understanding and awareness to the customers.
Responsible in the preparation of reports (e.g. forecasting, budgeting).
Provide competitive insight to both the marketing and business excellence teams.
Maintain and update sales activities and opportunities development records in CRM.
Maximize profitability by utilizing value selling and practices.
Prepare materials to conduct seminars and presentations.
This position reports to the Area Sales Manager based in Indonesia.


Education and/or Experience:

Minimum Diploma in Mechanical Engineering, Piping Engineering or equivalent.
Minimum 5 years of industrial sales experience.
Experience in managing distribution partners and customers is a must.
Demonstrated ability to penetrate new markets and to close business deals.
Possess own vehicle car is a must.
Willing to travel is a must.


Other Skills and Abilities:

Excellent interpersonal and communication skills at all levels within an international manufacturing environment.
Strong written and spoken English is a must.
Ability to develop an internal, informal network.
Proficient in the use of standard software packages.
Ability to work autonomously and effectively in a fast paced and evolving environment, self[1]motivated, with a strong entrepreneurial spirit.
A strong team player.

title: Event Marketing Specialist
company_description:
Mekari is the #1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company in Indonesia, aiming to empower the progress of businesses and professionals across various industries.

Our innovative cloud-based technology solution in HR (Mekari Talenta), Accounting (Mekari Jurnal), Sales (Mekari Qontak), Tax (Mekari Klikpajak), Electronic Signature (Mekari Sign), and Benefits (Mekari Flex) have been used by tens thousands of businesses in Indonesia.

To reach millions, we need more people like you —those eager to innovate, lead, and win with us.
about_the_job:
Mekari is Indonesia's no. 1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company. Our mission is to empower businesses and professionals to progress effortlessly. Our products (Mekari Talenta, Mekari Jurnal, Mekari KlikPajak, & Mekari Qontak) have been used by tens of thousands of businesses in Indonesia.

To reach millions, we need more people like you: entrepreneurs, builders, owners inside the company who are eager to grow at scale. Join us to empower more businesses with technology.

Job Descriptions

Assist planning, concepting, and developing Event Marketing activities
Exploring & identifying growth opportunities in Event Marketing
Exploring, identifying, and securing strategic partnership opportunities with related external partners
Develop, and execute event marketing calendars (hosting, tap-ins, joint event, and sponsorship)
Develop event sponsorship pipeline to establish brand visibility in the market
Collaborate with internal team and third parties

Requirements/Qualifications

Min. 2 years experience in Event Marketing B2B area
Proven track record in managing numbers of events in various marketing stages
Proven track record in managing events that attended by various company sizes & stages
Demonstrated project management & execution capabilities
Strong networking & strong soft-skills

What You Will Get

 Competitive salary + daily allowance.
 Premium private health insurance (outpatient, inpatient, maternity, dental).
 Early access to salary + flex installment (employee loan) via Mekari Flex.
 Allowance for sports activities and glasses/contact lenses.
 Flexible working hours and remote work culture with free co-working space services.
 Annual and unpaid leaves from day 1 of join date + unlimited sick leave with doctor note.
 Notebook Ownership Program.
 Strategic office location, accessible by MRT.
 Friendly and dynamic work environment.
 Opportunity to take part in growing Indonesia's no. 1 SaaS company

Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application is shortlisted to the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up.

Don't forget to check our Recruitment FAQ at bit.ly/RecruitmentFAQ-Mekari [ENG] or bit.ly/RekrutmenMekari-FAQ [INA] to find the answers to commonly-asked questions regarding our recruitment process.

We wish you the best. Hope to see you around soon!

title: Key Account Lead Beauty (E-commerce)
company_description:
Welcome to the Michael Page global company profile.

Michael Page has five decades of expertise in professional services recruitment. We were established in London in 1976, and over this period we've grown organically to become one of the best-known and most respected consultancies, with an office network spanning six continents.

While size has its advantages, it doesn't define us - the nature of our organic growth means that each new office is integrated into the region that it serves. It also means that as an employer looking to hire, or as a candidate aiming to grow your career you have the best of both worlds; a team that understands the market and geography you operate in, plus the resources and expertise of an international network at your disposal.

Our teams are broken down to focus on industry, assignment type, salary level and location, so your hiring requirements or job search will all be handled by a specialist who knows your sector inside-out. We are confident that our expertise can add value to your recruitment or job search process – get in touch to find out more.
about_the_job:
Fast growing industry|Opportunity to work in a global brand company 


About Our Client

Our client is a well-known global brand. As a part of the global e-commerce team, they are looking for a Key Account Beauty Lead. You will be responsible in developing categories and the corresponding sub-categories.

Job Description

In this role you will be responsible in developing categories and the corresponding sub-categories by building a robust team, and conducting prioritization of sub categories, leads identification, leads generation, acquisition, incubation, and performance improvement & management.

Map category and sub categories landscape, and define priority on which segment to be developed in collaboration with merchant and merchandise strategy team
Define a go-to market strategy for a Beauty category
Plan, execute and maintain category performance (from acquisition to incubation and development)
Build a robust team, and manage collaborative and goal-oriented team culture
Doing Negotiation with the seller, performance, potential risk and price competitiveness
Come up with initiatives to continuously improve competitiveness advantage


The Successful Applicant

Minimum Bachelor's degree or above
Minimum 6+ years experience in Beauty categories, with strong networking to brands and big merchants; social media savvy
Good understanding of Beauty product policies and regulation in the industry
Good negoitation skills, strong logical thinking, and Interpersonal skills
Well connected to big players within the industry
Collaborative and open to changes and challenges

What's on Offer

Fast growing industry
Attractive remuneration package


Contact: Nabila Zasa

Quote job ref: JN-012024-6287468

About Our Client

The client is one of the leading companies specializing in piping systems, offering safe transport of liquids and gases. Having been in the industry for more than 200 years, they have been offering the best standards of piping solutions through the best technology innovations.

Job Description

Key responsibilities include (but are not limited to):
Develop sales activity in Mining market segment
Deliver profitable growth to the Mining market segment 
Ensure proper networking with Mining authorities, consultants, and contractors
Coordinate with distributor activities for securing sales to supply main projects on timely manner
The Successful Applicant

The successful candidate has an Engineering education background, is well-networked and possesses sales experience in the Mining business, and has excellent understanding of the process in mining operation that would require piping systems.

ability to read technical drawing
multiple project management ability
possesses demonstrated track record of success and performance

title: Technical Engineering - Factory, Serang
company_description:
King Sun ( 金日實業股份有限公司 ) Pertama kali didirikan di Taiwan pada tahun 1978. Bergerak di bidang pembuatan dan perakitan cooling tower yang profesional, logistik dan berbasis penyimpanan. Perusahaan kami juga mempunyai cabang kantor dan pabrik di China dan Vietnam
Pada tahun 1996 Kingsun mengembangkan sayapnya ke Indonesia dengan nama PT. King Sun Indo Utama yang berbasis di Jakarta pusat, kantor cabang di Surabaya dan pabrik di Serang. PT kami juga sudah lulus uji verifikasi ISO 9001 sehingga bisa dipastikan dapat menyediakan pelayanan kepada pelanggan dengan kualitas yang lebih baik dan terpecaya.
